summary: The Department of Defense provides billions of dollars through contract financing to acquire things like weapon systems and satellites. This financing can help contractors avoid expensive commercial loans and may help DOD reduce costs. In April 2023, DOD published a study on the effect of its contract financing policies on the defense industry. DOD proposed 16 actions that could support subcontractors and attract more new...
title: Contract Financing: Factors That Influence the Use of Financing Methods and DOD's Progress on Proposed Actions
